price: Ким ҳаракат қилса, ўзи учун қилади. Аллоҳ барча оламлардан Беҳожатдир.
arabic: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman jāhada fa-innamā yujāhidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ʿani al-ʿālamīna
